title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple pull/run workflow.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client library that wraps the Ollama HTTP API for chat, generate, embed, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers to interact with a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration providing Ollama LLM, chat, and embeddings components with callback support.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat history, model management, multi-user support, and OpenAI-style endpoint proxy.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Terminal copilot that uses Ollama models to suggest shell commands and explain CLI snippets on the fly.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension backed by Ollama models for local code completion.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and persistent storage.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama exposing synchronous and asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Retrieval-Augmented-Generation stack using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB for private document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into channels or DMs with slash commands.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible builds of the Ollama server and CLI for macOS and Linux.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models written in Rust + React.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for building LLM pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models, dependency-injection helpers, and minimal API examples.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBeaver VS Code plugin that adds SQL query generation and explanation using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin that brings private LLM summarization and continuation to your notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams query Ollama models from Slack threads with configurable system prompts.

title: ollama-mistral-7b-rag
summary: Example repo fine-tuning Mistral 7B with Ollama for domain-specific RAG and packaging it as a modelfile.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 instances with Ollama server pre-installed and systemd service.
